(6687x1+0)/1 mod 8192 = 6687. (6687x3+1)/2 mod 4096 = 1839. (6687x9+5)/4 mod 2048 = 711. (6687x27+19)/8 mod 1024 = 43. (6687x81+65)/16 mod 512 = 65. (6687x243+211)/32 mod 256 = 98. (6687x243+211)/64 mod 128 = 49. (6687x729+697)/128 mod 64 = 10. (6687x729+697)/256 mod 32 = 5. (6687x2187+2347)/512 mod 16 = 8. (6687x2187+2347)/1024 mod 8 = 4. (6687x2187+2347)/2048 mod 4 = 2. (6687x2187+2347)/4096 mod 2 = 1. (6687x6561+11137)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
